availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J. Conover, Jr (Owen County, Ky, prov govt conv rep)

body.p: Owen County, Kentucky soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Conover and Mary Conover. Household owned one enslaved person in 1840. Student in Owen County in 1850. Laborer in Owen County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861. Served in the 4th Kentucky Cavalry as private from October 28, 1861 to September 9, 1864. Served in Bucknerâ€™s Guards.
